text: Tom Boast (13 November 1905 - October 1988) was an Australian swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre backstroke event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Australian male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Australia Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers from Brisbane Category:Male backstroke swimmers
title: Tom Boast
